title: HUGE PROBLEM RIOT READ PLEASE
body:
I have 2 problems.

Attempting to reconnect- 

Im in the middle of a game and i get the attempting to reconnect notification on the top of my screen. At this moment i can move around or do anything the only thing that works is my health bar going down. This happens about 10 times a game.

League closes during a game- 

I'll just be playing and league of legends minimizes and i have to click it to reload it. This happens like 10 times a game as well.

I want to know if this issues is on my side or riot. As well as a fix.

replies.body:
The issues you are experiencing can be for a few reasons, and it's hard to say if they are related to each other.  For instance, the lag spikes you are experiencing may be due to an unstable connection or packet loss.  We have a [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) tool that may help you out with that.  Your game crashing may be the result of hardware or software acting up.  A fix for that could be as simple as updating your graphics driver, but we have a [Game Crash ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)guide available with some more comprehensive steps.  

My recommendation would be to first try the Log Reader and see if that resolves your issues.  If the issue persists, please contact our tech team to assist you by[ submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Hope that helps!
